headline: Technical Textiles Analysis and Global Forecast Report 2025 | Market to Reach $324.83 Billion by 2030 - Europe Solidifies Position as Leading Hub for Technical Textiles with Robust Infrastructure
summary: The global technical textiles market is poised to grow from USD 247.06 billion in 2025 to USD 324.83 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 5.6%. Natural fiber materials, favored for their eco-friendly attributes, are gaining traction across various applications such as agriculture and construction. The non-woven segment is highly versatile, serving healthcare needs in surgical masks and hygiene products. Europe stands as a key market due to its robust manufacturing and regulatory framework.
